Welcome to Trimmed Surface Meshing’s documentation!¶

Source code¶

The source code of this project can be found here. As I am not a majored in Computer Sciences and rarely take courses in the field, my code is far from well-organized or optimized.

Note

The code is still incomplete, the Mix-Integer-Programming is still under development.

Wiki page¶

My Notebook can be used as a wiki page for this project. It contains some thoughts and ideas behind technical details in the code. The notebook use TiddlyWiki 5.

References¶

  1. Jingjing Shen, Jiri Kosinka, Malcolm Sabin, Neil Dodgson.(2014). Conversion of Trimmed NURBS Surfaces to Catmull-Clark Subdivision Surfaces. Computer Aided Geometric Design, 2014, 31(7-8): 486-498. [PDF]
  2. David Bommes, Henrik Zimmer, Leif Kobbelt. (2009). Mixed-Integer Quadrangulation. ACM Transactions on Graphics (TOG), 28(3) [PDF]
